post.body: thiss guy's the guy who-who-who...exactly. and when the copshh shhowed up... exactly. jeesus. gimme a beer for thissh guy. yeah.
watching zack n miri make a porno...Jay clearly "gets awesome" at 53:15...for, my'know, yer files.
..."Then why you tryin' to fuck him like one brad?"..."Say 'what' one more goddamn time, i dare you. I double dog dare you!"
whatevs.
yes kanYe is trash. and a total douchebagger. call me at my folks house, or email me yr number. me n finn r bored.
apmersand. not just a good name for a monkey.
btw, someone dumped their entire collection of XTC LPs & singles off at used rekkid store. wax for days. the good life. SQUIDPIRATE, M.F!
did i say no more chronic? shite.
ok 2009. i will attack you with resolutions...no more chronic *ouch*. sell at least a painting a week. get 10 single artist shows this year.
omg...tip o the hat to kevin smith for MARVELOUS placement of the pixies' "hey" in this flick.
"what an artist, i think that was Kurosawa's motto...'shit going into other shit'..."
at home with sick kid who likes the arcade fire over lalo schiffrin. aah youth. quit crouping kid, so i can drink an' watch pirated movies!
2009: decidedly better by default. unless there is a zombie apocalypse. no, ESPECIALLY if there is a zombie apocalypse.
2008: wife left me after cheating. lost my house. chad died. clint died. year spent looking for work, couch hopping, and being homeless.
Quote from my 4 year old: "Dad, can we please listen to Arcade Fire, and knock off this silliness? It's just silly." (everyone's a critic)
devendra banhart, panda bear, primal scream, etc. on shuffle*inking some sketches* peach tea, swiss cheese. @eddiebrockjr HIT ME UP.
nope. just same old 'eccentricities'....(must be polite on the twitterses)
thinks ex wife is stalking me.
seriously. this is the funniest, stupidest, craziest thing ever. who wants to join 'The Society To Promote Bad Stuff'? Costume required.
this gives me an idea. i will become a Real Life Super Villain. There must be a balance. (needs more purple paint for galactus helmet)
